nodes.text: Nevo Faunor was a male Human bounty hunter and assassin who worked with his brother, Irol Faunor on many jobs, with their loyal grunts that were paid well. Even though he and his brother were experienced in their work they had to retreat when attmepting to capture a scientist named Min Erethen, because there were mercenaries protecting her. Nevo was armed with a DL-12 heavy blaster pistol and a Duelist vibrorapier, which he used more often. He usually wore a combat jumpsuit.
